entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #43927
  • Backport the fix from #43844 to .NET 6 LTS #43925
  • Blazor InputText bind to int #43924
  • Perf regression: mvc #43915

Closed

  • Blazor JSInterop failure/exception not reported in Blazor app #38502
    Backlog
  • Add Http/2 WebSocket HttpClient interop tests #41895
    7.0-rc2
  • HTTP/2 WebSockets should not allow using the body streams #43697
    7.0-rc2
  • ANCM native module hanging in early initialisation #43651
  • HttpSysException(1299): Indicates a particular Security ID may not be assigned as the label of an object. #43773
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #43890
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #43914
  • Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView OnLogInSucceeded event firing multiple times #39507
    7.0-rc2
  • I want to perform an optimal search on my database using Tempdata to move the list of search request to the view #43920
  • NavigationLock with ConfirmExternalNavigation throws exception when prerendering #43724
    7.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly empty template minor issues #43869
    7.0-rc2
  • Conflicting assets with the same target path after upgrading Blazor from .net 5 to .net 6 #39606
    7.0-rc2
  • Razor Class Libraries require explicit inheritance of ComponentBase in code-behind while Blazor project do not. #43734
  • Blazor WASM Does not serve linked files #43840
  • ComponentBase.BuildRenderTree cannot be overriden #43883
  • Provide accurate message for bad type assignment #43898
  • Signing certificates on the fly in `ServerCertificateSelector` can not return the signed certificate. #42715
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Retry Tests #43932
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix double dispatch on linux #43931
    area-runtime
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] [WebView] Avoid Base64 encoding because Json Serializer should do that #43923
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Explains that AddJsonOptions will use web defaults #43921
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0e0d9fe` to `c29315d` #43918
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [7.0, Test only] Add Http/2 WebSocket HttpClient interop tests #43851
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [7.0] Disable body streams for H2 CONNECT requests #43814
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Fix redirect to login #43520
    area-mvc
  • SDK Upgrade #43929
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Use same language set for .wxl and .json files (#43888) #43930
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `ec91da8` to `822849d` #43917
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43853
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add a JS initializer for the Blazor custom elements package #43809
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Improve Output Caching public API #43892
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix endpoints in StaticFileAuth sample #43352
    area-security, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix `Path` and `Exception` content in the Problem Details Json #43848
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
